column2: "Writ petitions  are  decided on  the  basis  of statements  on

inaccurate 
affidavit.  If the  petition  contains  misleading,

statements  or  there  are  suppression  of material facts, 
the
Court will not entertain the petition. "
In  the circumstances we refuse notice.
